  13. ‌#define gnode(t,i)        (&(t)->node[i])
  14. ‌#define gval(n)                (&(n)->i_val)
  15. ‌#define gnext(n)        ((n)->i_key.nk.next)


  18. /* 'const' to avoid wrong writings that can mess up field 'next' */
  19. ‌#define gkey(n)                cast(const TValue*, (&(n)->i_key.tvk))

  21. ‌#define wgkey(n)                (&(n)->i_key.nk)

  23. ‌#define invalidateTMcache(t)        ((t)->flags = 0)


  26. /* returns the key, given the value of a table entry */
  27. ‌#define keyfromval(v) \
  28.   (gkey(cast(Node *, cast(char *, (v)) - offsetof(Node, i_val))))
